title: Setting up the Matrix
text: Let $$x$$ represent the number of cashews, let $$y$$ represent the number of pistachios, and $$z$$ represent the number of almonds.

title: Gaussian Elimination
text: Now that you have the matrix $$\mat{(1, 1, 1, 1000), (0, 1, -1, 100), (3, 4, 5, 3700)$$,} solve the system using Gaussian elimination.

title: Expressing $$z$$
text: Start by using the second row to express $$z$$ in terms of $$y$$, i.e., $$z=y-100$$.

title: Finding $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: Substitute $$z=y-100$$ into the first and third equations and simplify.
